dialogue.text: Is being awake even a thing? Isn't that just the core of a deceiving argument that you've let me go on believing â€” even though you think it's a lie?

psychological_notes: Evan questions the fundamental binary of awake/asleep that has underpinned much of his journey. He suspects the architect has allowed him to believe in a false dichotomy, revealing growing sophistication in recognizing constructed narratives about consciousness. The slight accusation shows he's becoming aware of the therapeutic fiction.

therapeutic_direction: Moving beyond binary thinking about awareness states
